p.d: A reappearing handbag, coveted land and a kindly neighbour are all the investigators have to help them to resolve a cold case that suddenly resurfaces. Kelly puts her hand on the ghost that's been haunting the house of Gaspard's ex. Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trules (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective
